word_mean: 二分(一分为二)：分为两部分的过程
二〔分〕叉，二歧：分为两部分的结果

sentence.Network_en: There is a dichotomy between the academic world and the industrial world.
sentence.Network_cn: 学术界与工业界有着天壤之别。

sentence.Network_en: Such a dichotomy cannot simply be attributed to coincidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样一种分歧不能简单归之于巧合.

sentence.Network_en: If this dichotomy is maintained what happens to the rate of interest?
sentence.Network_cn: 如果保持这种二分法,利率会怎样 呢 ?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 二分法（Dichotomy）是人认识世界的基本思维过程。我们需要把事情分门别类，这样才能进行对比，这样才能根据这些异同做出解释…
“调适”之两分法(dichotomy)，由美国汉学家墨子刻(Thomas A.Metzger)教授最先提出。
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... gloomy 阴暗的，没有希望的 dichotomy 二分，本质对立 smarmy 迎奉的，讨好的.
LSAT红宝书1 - 豆丁网 ... diatom 硅藻属 dichotomy 两分,二分法,分裂 dicta 格言,权威的断言.

list.abs: dichotomy 二分dichotomy system 二分系统dichroic mirror 二向色镜
2、古典二分法(classical dichotomy):把宏观经济变现区分为实际层面和名义层面两个部分,被称为古典二分法。 古典二分法认为,在充分就业时,所有影响实际变量的因素与.
西方经济学中的经典二分法的问题（Classical Dichotomy）满意答案  20 [ 标签：经典二分法, classical, dichotomy ] 笨笨熊 2010-04-01.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: via modern Latin from Greek dikhotomia, from dikho- 'in two, apart' + -tomia (see -tomy)

entry.def: If there is a dichotomy between two things, there is a very great difference or opposition between them.

example.ex: There is a dichotomy between the academic world and the industrial world.
example.tran: 学术界与工业界有着天壤之别。

means.word_mean: 1. being twofold; a classification into two opposed parts or subclasses;

sentences.sentence: "the dichotomy between eastern and western culture"

auth_sentence.content: Your 'eitheror' is of course a false dichotomy.

auth_sentence.content: This false dichotomy strands itself upon its incautious terms.
auth_sentence.res_content: This false dichotomy strands itself upon its incautious terms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This false dichotomy strands itself upon its incautious terms.

sentences.en: an odd dichotomy in his attitude
sentences.cn: 他的态度中自相矛盾而使人莫名其妙之处
